name: LVUG
body:
### London VoIP User Group
LVUG is a forum for user's of VoIP software and standards, particularly open software and open standards. 

Monthly meetups are organised on Meetup.com [here](http://www.meetup.com/London-VoIP-User-Group-LVUG/).

There is also a mailing list.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
